text: hige, allahana vagdanavu satyavembudannu mattu (lokantyada) a ghalige baruvudaralli sansayavilla embudannu avaru (uravaru) ariyabekendu navu avarige, avara (guheyavara) kuritu mahiti nididevu. (Nimage tilidirali;) avaru (uravaru) avara kuritu jagaladidaga,kelavaru ‘‘avara (guheya) mele ondu kattadavannu nirmisiri’’ endaru. Avarannu avara odeyanu cennagiballanu. Konege avara mele prabalya hondidda kelavaru ‘‘navu avara (guheya) mele'ondu masidiyannu kattona’’ endaru
